PatientDetails.Name: Joanna Sprague
HospitalCourse: Admitted on 09/19/2024 for NSTEMI complicated by cardiogenic shock.
Underwent emergent PTCA and subsequent Impella insertion.
Extubated but re-intubated same day due to airway protection.
Continuing discussion of goals of care with family amidst guarded prognosis.

Medications: Ticagrelor and Aspirin for post-PCI management
ElectronicMedicalRecords.HospitalDischarge: Discharged on 10/05/2024 after stabilizing, but with ongoing health concerns.

InfectionIndicators.BloodCulture: No organism isolated on current cultures.

Sepsis.ClinicalNotes: Suspicion of infection without a known source; ongoing monitoring for sepsis.

BloodProducts.HemoglobinLevels: 9.0 (L) as of 10/04/2024; previously transfused during care.
BloodProducts.TransfusionEvents: Transfused with packed red blood cells to maintain hemoglobin greater than 8.
